segments.text: I see this kitchen scene unfolding right before my eyes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's an adult woman standing by the sink, drying a plate with a towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's wearing a dress and apron, looking completely focused on that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is pouring from the faucet, and the sink is overflowing onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A puddle is forming around her feet, but she doesn't seem to notice at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To her left, there's a boy climbing on a stool that's looking really wobbly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching into the open cabinet for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His hand is inside, grabbing some cookies, and the stool is tilting back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A girl is standing nearby, her arm up as if she's waiting for a cookie from him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window above the sink shows a nice garden outside, all calm and green.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's funny how the outside looks so peaceful while inside it's chaos waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will turn around and see what's going on.
segments.speaker: PAR
